tool.name: extract_bcs.py
tool.command:
extract_bcs.py #if $positional_1 and $positional_1 is not None: $positional_1 #end if
#if $positional_2 and $positional_2 is not None: $positional_2 #end if
--bcs $extractedbcs
> $default

param.label: Pattern of barcode nucleotides starting at 5'-end. X positions will be moved to the header, N positions will be kept.
param.name: positional_2

tool.help:
Exract barcodes from a FASTQ file according to a user-specified pattern.
